Nearing the scene of the battle, Empath reaches out and drops a 
blanket of her will over Galvatron, interfering with his motions to 
the point where it would take legendary force of will to overcome the 
induced pain and sluggishness and continue to fight.

She allows herself a small chuckle.  Without the power of the Soul Orb 
- HER Soul Orb - she could never have so crippled another bot from 
this distance.  But now her mental powers have been sent off the scale 
by Vok energies.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatrons tail whipped out to block it and it was cut off in the 
process. 
> Spark shot from it. He howled in pain. His training let him continue 
on 
> blocking it out. Galvatrons saw a blip on his radar. An object 
Megatron was 
> carrying. It was causing a wierd energy to flow from it. He swung  
his sword 
> at it trying to free it. Any advantage he could get.
